Aggestus.text: There is little cause for apprehension

Aggravo.text: There is no cause for apprehension

Agilis.text: Arranged everything satisfactorily, return at once

Agilitas.text: Will arrange everything to your satisfaction

Agnos.text: Can you come to any arrangement

Agripeta.text: Cannot account for non-arrival. Will make immediate enquiry

Agrium.text: Enquire of agents date of arrival

Ahenipes.text: Enquire of agents date and port of arrival

Aizoon.text: Enquire of agents date and port of arrival, and meet me

Alabaster.text: Glad to hear of your safe arrival

Alacritas.text: Shall arrive and require a conveyance at

Alapa.text: Shall arrive and require a porter at ---

Alatus.text: Shall arrive and require breakfast at ---

Alauda.text: Shall arrive and require dinner at ---

Albarius.text: Shall arrive and require lunch at ---

Albesco.text: Shall arrive and require supper at ---

Albumen.text: Arrived here after a very bad passage
